console.text:
TensorDict(
    fields={
        RGB: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 144, 192, 3]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.uint8, is_shared=False),
        agents: TensorDict(
            fields={
                action: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.int64, is_shared=False),
                logits: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7, 7]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.float32, is_shared=False),
                observation: TensorDict(
                    fields={
                        RGB: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7, 3, 88, 88]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.float32, is_shared=False),
                        vector_obs: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7, 2]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.float32, is_shared=False)},
                    batch_size=torch.Size([10, 7]),
                    device=None,
                    is_shared=False)},
            batch_size=torch.Size([10, 7]),
            device=None,
            is_shared=False),
        done: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 1]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.bool, is_shared=False),
        next: TensorDict(
            fields={
                RGB: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 144, 192, 3]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.uint8, is_shared=False),
                agents: TensorDict(
                    fields={
                        observation: TensorDict(
                            fields={
                                RGB: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7, 3, 88, 88]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.float32, is_shared=False),
                                vector_obs: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7, 2]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.float32, is_shared=False)},
                            batch_size=torch.Size([10, 7]),
                            device=None,
                            is_shared=False),
                        reward: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 7, 1]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.float64, is_shared=False)},
                    batch_size=torch.Size([10, 7]),
                    device=None,
                    is_shared=False),
                done: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 1]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.bool, is_shared=False),
                terminated: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 1]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.bool, is_shared=False)},
            batch_size=torch.Size([10]),
            device=None,
            is_shared=False),
        terminated: Tensor(shape=torch.Size([10, 1]), device=cpu, dtype=torch.bool, is_shared=False)},
    batch_size=torch.Size([10]),
    device=None,
    is_shared=False)
